sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>All the synonyms and semantic shortcut xml files for NLQ has been moved from apply_once to update folder. Hence, deleting the file names in the sys_update table</description> <name>nlq_remove_files_from_sys_update</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[sn_applyonce.ApplyOnce.allowOneMoreUpdate("nlq_semantic_shortcut_174c6c0d732333006c629bcefaf6a741.xml"); sn_applyonce.ApplyOnce.allowOneMoreUpdate("nlq_synonym_ebe091cc732333006c629bcefaf6a743.xml");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-04-24 17:46:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>75b9927253d0101090a1ddeeff7b12d7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>nlq_remove_files_from_sys_update</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Natural Language Query" source="com.snc.nlq">bb8b74643c35311068bcf327dfe37fe1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_75b9927253d0101090a1ddeeff7b12d7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-04-24 17:46:35</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
